housing

Class MortgageApproval

  • java.lang.Object
    • housing.MortgageApproval

  • public class MortgageApproval
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is created by a mortgage-lender when it approves a mortgage. It acts as a convenient container of information pertaining to a mortgage, and doubles up as a contract that represents the mortgage itself.
    Author:
    daniel, davidrpugh

      double makeMonthlyPayment()
      Updates internal variables to simulate a payment being made (Does not move any assets from payer to payee).

      Use this to pay off the mortgage early or make a one-off payment.

        public double makeMonthlyPayment()
        Updates internal variables to simulate a payment being made (Does not move any assets from payer to payee).

      • payoff

        public double payoff(double amount)
        Use this to pay off the mortgage early or make a one-off payment.
        Parameters:
        amount - Desired amount to pay off
        Returns:
        Amount that was actually payed off.
